entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as saying 'You-Know-Who's name' and sounding shocked and impressed. He is also described as having loads to learn.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as saying the name of You-Know-Who and explaining that he wasn't trying to be brave.
